story.text: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site. From this page you can find who we are and what we do.

story.prompt:
Link to a page about yourself here. Type your name enclosed in double square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.

Make all pages here yours alone with the login below.

story.text: Pages where we do and share.

story.prompt: Create pages about things you do on this wiki. Type a descriptive name of something you will be writing about. Enclose it in square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.
story.text: This is a site [[built to gather lists]] of issues, questions and items from a rostered neighborhood and make them available to anyone visiting the site.
The list is to be built on a schedule which matches the frequency of established hangouts, and [[published]] 24 hours before it is to begin.
It is experimental and not meant to establish a standard.
here are [[all the sites I know about]]
You can edit your copy of these pages. Press [+] to add more writing spaces. Read [[How to Wiki]] for more ideas. Follow [[Recent Changes]] here and nearby.

item.text: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site. From this page you can find who we are and what we do. New sites provide this information and then claim the site as their own. You will need your own site to participate.

item.prompt:
Link to a page about yourself here. Type your name enclosed in double square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.

Make all pages here yours alone with the login below.
